rev.comment: General [[WP:MOS|formatting]], inc. removal of superscripted ordinals
/* See also */ listing in see also is all D. Y. deserves here

DenÃ©-Yeniseic is not really an element of the Dene-Caucasian hypothesis at all. It's an independent, and only rather vaguely similar idea. Even to the extent that it holds that D. and Y. are related, the details differ greatly from D. C.
/* DenÃ©-Yeniseic */ Adding a "main" (which however also appears elsewhere).
